180163503980544001.name: Chrono Weave Mantle
180163503980544001.description: A cloak spun from the threads of time itself. Allows the wearer to glimpse potential futures, providing unparalleled foresight in battle, and enhances the rapid recovery of spell energy.

180163503980544001.name: Celestial Shard
180163503980544001.description: A fragment of a star, this shard imbues the user with cosmic energy, enhancing magical abilities and granting brief glimpses into the future.

180163503980544001.name: Sturdy Twine Bracelet
180163503980544001.description: A simple yet durable bracelet made from braided twine. It does not possess enchantments but is believed to bring good luck and safe travels to those who wear it.
